alternativeAbbreviations: G.Andersson From from TL2 Supp.1;C.Andersson From TL2
examples: Hieracium x psilophyllum G.Andersson ex Dahlst. in Kongl. Svenska Vetensk. Acad. Handl., 23(15): 47 (1890).
source: In Brummitt & Powell, Authors of Plant Names (1992) with standard form 'C.Andersson' as in TL2 but Carl Andersson (1818-1846) not listed.
